text: Rex Lassam (13 July 1896 - 14 January 1983) was a British swimmer. He competed in two events at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1983 deaths Category:British male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Great Britain Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Stafford
title: Rex Lassam
